snippet: The Topps Company, the leading baseball card manufacturer, is trying to breathe digital life into a once-cherished hobby with apps aimed at a techcentric youth market.
abstract: Topps Company is trying to bring its leading baseball card business into the digital era using smartphone and tablet apps that appeal to a techcentric youth market while capturing the nostalgia of trading cards; apps represent a strategy to expand the fading baseball card sector into a broader media company complete with digital offerings, shows, movies and clothing lines.
lead_paragraph: The Topps Company, the leading baseball card manufacturer, is trying to breathe digital life into a once-cherished hobby with apps aimed at a techcentric youth market.

headline.seo: Apps Join Baseball Cards in Topps Lineup
